scalar:array.comment: /** * Swift Mailer PopB4Smtp Pop3 Connection component * Please read the LICENSE file * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> * @package Swift_Authenticator * @license GNU Lesser General Public License */

/** * Swift PopB4Smtp Authenticator Connection Component for the POP3 server * Provides a I/O wrapper for the POP3 connection * @package Swift_Authenticator * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> */
/** * The server to connect to (IP or FQDN) * @var string */
/** * The port to connect to * @var int */
/** * The open connection resource from fsockopen() * @var resource */
/** * Constructor * @param string The name of the POP3 server * @param int The port for the POP3 service * @param int The level of encryption to use */
/** * Set the server name * @param string The IP or FQDN of the POP3 server */
/** * Set the port number for the POP3 server * @param int */
/** * Get the server name * @return string */
/** * Get the remote port number * @return int */
/** * Set the level of enryption to use (see ENC_OFF or ENC_SSL) * @param int The constant for the encryption level */
/** * Get the current encryption level set (corresponds to ENC_SSL or ENC_OFF) * @return int */
/** * Check if the response is a +OK response * @throws Swift_ConnectionException Upon bad response */

subNode:value.scalar:string: The POP3 server did not suitably respond with a +OK response.

scalar:array.comment: /** * Try to open the connection * @throws Swift_ConnectionException If the connection will not start */

subNode:value.scalar:string: The POP3 connection failed to start. The error string returned from fsockopen() is [

scalar:array.comment: /** * Try to close the connection * @throws Swift_ConnectionException If the connection won't close */

subNode:value.scalar:string: The POP3 connection did not close successfully.

scalar:array.comment: /** * Return the unread buffer contents * @return string * @throws Swift_ConnectionException If the connection will not allow data to be read */

subNode:value.scalar:string: Data could not be read from the POP3 connection.

scalar:array.comment: /** * Write a command to the remote socket * @param string the command to send (without CRLF) * @throws Swift_ConnectionException If the command cannot be written */

subNode:value.scalar:string: Data could not be written to the POP3 connection.

scalar:array.comment: /** * Swift PopB4Smtp Authenticator Connection Component for the POP3 server * Provides a I/O wrapper for the POP3 connection * @package Swift_Authenticator * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> */
